effect.x-y: For five turns (including this one), every Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped.

short_effect.x-y: All Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns.

flavor_text.x-y: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.
